EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Pivotal: The way the future gets built
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Our mission at Pivotal is to transform how the world builds and runs software. Leveraging a platform, tools and methodology approach that is based on lean application development principles, we work with leading organisations including Ford, Liberty Mutual, CoreLogic and Yahoo Japan to empower them to build great quality software.
For more information on how your organisation can improve your software development practices, please access the following resources:
- Built To Adapt Benchmark: View the results and take the survey to compare how well your organisation builds, deploys, and operates software - https://benchmark.builttoadapt.io/overall - DBS Customer Story: Watch the video 'Digital Transformation in the Banking Industry' from SpringOne Platform 2018 - https://content.pivotal.io/springone-platform-2018/day-3-keynote-siew-choo-soh - Forrester Report: Understand the total economic impact of Pivotal Cloud Foundry as examined by the analysts - https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/the-total-economic-impact-of-pivotal-cloud-foundry.pdf
I trust these resources will help you make transformation real for your organisation.
Regards,
Lionel Lim Vice President and Managing Director, Asia Pacific & Japan Pivotal
We respect your privacy. Should you not be interested in keeping in touch with Pivotal click here <[[https://pivotal.io/subscription-management]]> to manage your subscripton preferences.
